contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox airport | name = Queen Charlotte City Water Aerodrome | IATA = | ICAO = | TC = CAQ6 | type = Public | owner = | operator = Queen Charlotte City Harbour Authority | city-served = | location = [[Queen Charlotte City, British Columbia]] | elevation-f = 0 | latd = 53 | latm = 15 | lats = 15.5 | latNS = N | longd= 132 | longm= 04 | longs= 32 | longEW= W | coordinates_region = CA-BC | pushpin_map = Canada British Columbia | pushpin_label = CAQ6 | pushpin_map_caption = Location in British Columbia | website = | r1-number = n/a | r1-length-f = n/a | r1-length-m = n/a | r1-surface = [[Water]] | footnotes = Source: [[Canada Flight Supplement|Water Aerodrome Supplement]]<ref name="CFS">{{WAS}}</ref> }} '''Queen Charlotte City Water Aerodrome''', {{Airport codes||||CAQ6}}, is located adjacent to [[Queen Charlotte City, British Columbia|Queen Charlotte City]], [[British Columbia]], [[Canada]]. ==References== <references/> {{List of airports in Canada}} [[Category:Seaplane bases in British Columbia]] [[Category:Skeena-Queen Charlotte Regional District]] [[Category:Graham Island]] [[Category:Registered aerodromes in British Columbia]] {{BritishColumbia-airport-stub}}
